title: A Shuai season4
synopsis: Ah Shuai is afraid of kicking a weak "bad student" in middle school. He is mischievous, lacks stability, poorly studied, and is the last in the final exam. But in fact, he is a humorous, funny, fantasy, helpful and sympathetic junior high school student. . He is always unlucky and embarrassed! With big-faced girls at the same table, buddies (friends) Xiao Chong, rich second-generation Zhuang Ku, teacher Jin Chengwu and others have inextricable experiences and fate. Everyone is charming on campus, family, and daily life? ! Extraordinary? ! Ah Shao will experience the status of class leader, floor sweeping team leader, librarian, voluntary toilet cleaner, toilet tyrant, takeaway boy, security, chef, boss, etc. This time, can he stand up and counterattack and change himself in the hearts of his friends The position of turning into a slave is singing, nothing is impossible, only unexpected, the hilarious is coming again, don't miss the good show! (translated from bilibili)
